title: Warmer water in Lake Mead risks vital operations
description: Rising water temperatures in Lake Mead, driven by drought and climate change, challenge water treatment and hydropower operations, experts warn.
content: Rising water temperatures in Lake Mead, driven by drought and climate change, challenge water treatment and hydropower operations, experts warn.
